name: Fly By Wire
description:
A short game where you play as a little computer with a USB cable and a dream.

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (theme: "joined together").

--

[R]: reset the current level

Left Mouse Button: connect (launch cable)

Right Mouse Button: retrieve cable

While connected:

Right Mouse Button: disconnect

[Spacebar]: power device on/off
